samples.question: So do you use perfume?
samples.transcript: I do not really use perfume that often honestly, Because I do not usually go out that much. I would consider myself as an introvert person rather than an extrovert one. So, using perfume has not really always occurred to me. So, yeah.

samples.question: What kind of perfume do you like?
samples.transcript: Well, as I have said before, perfume is not really, you know, my thing. So, I guess I would have to say, a perfume that I have heard about. A perfume that is, it has a smell that is somewhat related to wood. I think it is very classy and it is very easy to bring with you wherever you go.

samples.question: Okay, and what does perfume mean to you?

samples.question: So, do you think all people's life will improve with the development of technology?
samples.transcript: I guess it depends on how they approach the technology Obviously they can benefit from the better healthcare and the better transportation systems and the infrastructure that can be utilized towards caring for elderly people But at the same time technology can expose them to the different scams and frauds that are available all everywhere on the internet So I guess it a two story Alright, so, do people prefer to stay at home or go outside and why? Well, personally, I would love to stay at home rather than go outside. As I have said before, I am more of an introvert. when I go to my grandparents' home, I would definitely, advise them to go outside or, you know, go on a trip or something like that when we are on vacation. Because I believe that now that they have lived such a difficult life for me to, you know, enjoy the things that I have now, I should definitely spend my time trying to, you know, compensate some sort of the things that they have gone through.

samples.question: What are the benefits of elderly people living alone?
samples.transcript: I do not think there is much benefits for, you know, elderly people to live in isolation. I think it is quite dangerous for them because feeling lonely when you are old is very popular nowadays. As a kid and a grandkid, if I do not pay much attention to my grandparents, I think that I am not really, you know, I am living in a very careless way. that is for sure. All right.

samples.question: Okay, and how often do you buy shoes?
samples.transcript: Actually, even though I like shoes, I do not buy it that often because once I buy shoes, I think I take it for like four to five years of time. So the first time, whenever I buy the shoes, I always get expensive one. So normally high quality ones, brand shoes, and then I just take them for like three to four years. If it goes longer than that, five years. okay.

samples.question: And do you prefer comfortable or good looking shoes?
samples.transcript: Comfortable, definitely, because whenever I wear high heels, it is so uncomfortable, I cannot walk around that long. And I like to be active outside, so I normally wear comfortable shoes. So even right now I am wearing sneakers. okay.

samples.question: So what do you think the clothes we wear say about us?
samples.transcript: It represents our character and the lifestyle that we are aiming for. For example, even though I like high heels and mini skirts, I do not wear it that often because I really like to be comfortable and I like casual clothes. So I can be active and meet a lot of people while I am outside. my hobby is walking outside, socializing, and going to events. And whenever I wear some fancy clothes, it was not comfortable at all. So for me, clothes is something that represents your character. And yeah, so it represents the special vibe of a person. Okay.

samples.question: And how have clothes fashions changed in your country over the past few decades?

samples.question: And how do you think fashion will change in the future?
samples.transcript: I think it will just take a turn, like a circulation, so I have no idea how it is going to be changed. But whenever I see Vogue models or the fashion magazine or the runway show, Always the fashion in there has been quite unique and modern and sometimes kind of weird So people are actually aiming for individuality more and more So sometimes I think it can go extreme So in the future the new generation will aim for something unique that is even on the level of being weird Yeah And people will find it unique Yeah Okay. So, those are all the questions. So thank you very much. Thank you for your time. Alright, so.
